DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess efficacy safety DU-176b compare enoxaparin sodium prevention venous thromboembolism patient elective total knee arthroplasty .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Study DU-176b , Prevention Venous Thromboembolism Patients After Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo unilateral total knee arthroplasty Subjects risk hemorrhage Subjects thromboembolic risk Subjects weigh less 40 kg Subjects pregnant suspect pregnancy , subject want become pregnant .
